alert.note: Alert for Belknap; Cheshire; Merrimack; Sullivan; Western And Central Hillsborough (New Hampshire) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 11 at 3:31PM EST until January 13 at 12:00AM EST by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...WINTRY WEATHER EXPECTED TO BRING SLIPPERY CONDITIONS TO THE AREA THURSDAY INTO FRIDAY... .Light to moderate snow will overspread New Hampshire and western Maine from Thursday morning and afternoon and continue into Thursday night, making for a slippery commute in the afternoon and evening hours. Some freezing rain is also possible Thursday evening and Thursday night. ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 1 PM THURSDAY TO MIDNIGHT EST THURSDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation expected. Total snow accumulations up to 3 inches and ice accumulations around a light glaze. * WHERE...Portions of south central and southwest Maine. Portions of central and southern New Hampshire. * WHEN...From 1 PM Thursday to Midnight EST Thursday Night. * IMPACTS...Even light snowfall and ice amounts can accumulate on roads and cause hazardous driving conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the Thursday evening commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by going to newengland511.org
